summary: This document contains a checklist for due diligence required for opening business accounts at First Bank, specifically focusing on high-risk businesses and individuals. It includes detailed requirements for documentation and verification processes, particularly for accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein and FSF, LLC. The document emphasizes compliance with regulations and the need for thorough background checks. This document contains various financial records and legal documents related to FSF, LLC, a limited liability company associated with Jeffrey Epstein. It includes details about the company's formation, banking arrangements, and an affidavit confirming that the company did not conduct any business. The document highlights Epstein's role as the sole member and manager of FSF, LLC.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the sole member and manager of FSF, LLC, confirming that the company has not conducted any business since its formation.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is listed as the contact person for FSF, LLC, associated with the account opening process.

persons.name: Janice Stridiron
persons.context: Janice Stridiron is mentioned in relation to compliance checks and verifications for Jeffrey Epstein's account.

persons.name: Maria Tankenson Hodge
persons.context: Maria Tankenson Hodge is mentioned as the organizer of FSF, LLC and serves as the registered agent for the company.

persons.name: Denise Francois
persons.context: Denise Francois is referenced as the attorney representing FSF, LLC in correspondence regarding the company's certificate of existence.

persons.name: Hedy Szabo
persons.context: Hedy Szabo is mentioned in correspondence regarding the banking arrangements for FSF, LLC.

persons.name: Gregory R. Francis
persons.context: Gregory R. Francis is mentioned in the context of certifying the existence of FSF, LLC.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is the account holder for FSF, LLC at First Bank.
Janice Stridiron is involved in the compliance checks for Jeffrey Epstein's account.
Maria Tankenson Hodge is the organizer and registered agent for FSF, LLC, which is solely owned by Jeffrey Epstein.
Denise Francois represents FSF, LLC in legal matters.
Hedy Szabo is involved in the banking arrangements for FSF, LLC.
Gregory R. Francis certifies the existence of FSF, LLC as the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands.

events.title: Account Verification
events.description: Verification checks for Jeffrey Epstein's account were conducted, including OFAC and ID checks.

events.title: FSF, LLC Account Established
events.description: The account for FSF, LLC was established at First Bank.

events.title: Formation of FSF, LLC
events.description: FSF, LLC was registered to conduct business in the Virgin Islands.

events.title: Correspondence Regarding Certificate of Existence
events.description: Denise Francois writes to Hedy Szabo to clarify the lack of a certificate of existence for FSF, LLC.

events.title: Affidavit of Non-Business
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein submits an affidavit stating that FSF, LLC has not conducted any business since its formation.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's account is classified as high risk, requiring additional due diligence.
The document outlines specific requirements for high-risk business accounts, including FSF, LLC.
Janice Stridiron is responsible for compliance checks related to Epstein's account.
The account for FSF, LLC was established on October 21, 2008.
Verification checks for Epstein's identity included OFAC and ID checks, which passed.
Jeffrey Epstein is the sole member and manager of FSF, LLC.
FSF, LLC was formed on October 21, 2008, and has not conducted any business.
Maria Tankenson Hodge is the registered agent for FSF, LLC.
Denise Francois represents FSF, LLC in legal matters.
Gregory R. Francis certified the existence of FSF, LLC as the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands.
